havoc_lord.name: Traitor Lord
havoc_lord.description: A lord of the dark gods.

havoc_lord_on_bike.name: Traitor Lord on Bike
havoc_lord_on_bike.description: A lord of the dark gods riding a bike.

dark_engineer.name: Dark Engineer
dark_engineer.description: A human dedicated to fixing the corrupted machines of the dark gods.

dark_engineer_on_bike.name: Dark Engineer on Bike
dark_engineer_on_bike.description: A human dedicated to fixing the corrupted machines of the dark gods.

dark_psychic.name: Dark Psychic
dark_psychic.description: A powerful human whose mental powers have been twisted by the dark side.

dark_psychic_on_bike.name: Dark Psychic on Bike
dark_psychic_on_bike.description: A powerful human whose mental powers have been twisted by the dark side on a combat bike.

daemon_champion.name: Daemon Champion
daemon_champion.description: A twisted daemon whose powers have been boosted through service to the dark gods.

cultists.name: Cultists
cultists.description: Humans who have sold their souls to the dark gods.

havoc_brothers.name: Traitor Marines
havoc_brothers.description: Battle brothers corrupted by the dark gods.

havoc_support.name: Traitor Devastators
havoc_support.description: A squad of highly trained traitor marines armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

possessed_brothers.name: Possessed Brothers
possessed_brothers.description: A squad of traitor marines that have been gifted with daemonic mutations to aid them in battle.

winged_possessed_brothers.name: Possessed Brothers
winged_possessed_brothers.description: A squad of traitor marines that have been gifted with wings to aid them in battle.

greater_possessed_brothers.name: Greater Possessed Brothers
greater_possessed_brothers.description: A squad of traitor marines that have been gifted with significant daemonic mutations to aid them in battle.

talon_raptors.name: Talon Raptors
talon_raptors.description: A squad of elite traitor marines intent on acheiving melee carnage.

Havoc_destoyers.name: Traitor Destroyers
Havoc_destoyers.description: Destroyers that have been corrupted by the dark gods.

Mutated_destoyers.name: Mutated Destroyers
Mutated_destoyers.description: Destroyers that have been corrupted by the dark gods and have been gifted with extra mutations to aid them in battle.

daemon_spawn.name: Daemon Spawn
daemon_spawn.description: Horribly mutated beings that run rampant on the battlefield.

havoc_apc.name: Traitor APC
havoc_apc.description: A durable transport for the followers of the dark gods.

battle_tank.name: Traitor Battle Tank
battle_tank.description: An armored tank helmed by havoc brothers.

heavy_battle_tank.name: Traitor Heavy Battle Tank
heavy_battle_tank.description: A heavily armored tank sporting an arsenal of weapons touched by the dark gods.

infernal_brute.name: Infernal Brute
infernal_brute.description: A corrupted attack walker upgraded with infernal weapons.

infernal_stalker.name: Infernal Stalker
infernal_stalker.description: An infernal creation that crawls on the ground, stalking its prey.

havoc_fiend.name: Traitor Fiend
havoc_fiend.description: A viscious beast of twisted metal and flesh made to dominate the battlefeild.

spider_walker.name: Spider Walker
spider_walker.description: An infernal machine built to mimic a venomous spider.

crab_walker.name: Crab Walker
crab_walker.description: A huge demonic creation of metal which is powered by the souls of its victims.

havoc_dragon.name: Traitor Dragon
havoc_dragon.description: A living metal airplane designed to drag other aircraft out of the air.

lord_of_change.name: Lord of Change
lord_of_change.description: A master of combat that leads the forces of change.

sorceror_of_change.name: Sorceror of Change
sorceror_of_change.description: A distinguished sorceror who has managed to rise through the ranks of the change brothers.

birdman_sorceror.name: Birdman Sorceror
birdman_sorceror.description: A mutated half bird half man sorceror that leads demonic forces of change.

change_brothers.name: Psychic Brothers
change_brothers.description: Hexed traitor marines whose bodies have been turned to dust by a horrible curse, but fight on as mindless automatons in their remaining armor.

change_destroyers.name: Psychic Destroyers
change_destroyers.description: Change brothers in destroyer amror suffering from the same curse as their brothers, but still fight stolidly by their side.

birdmen.name: Birdmen
birdmen.description: Mutated half bird half man creatures that fight with the change brothers to acheive their goals.

blessing_of_change.name: Blessing of Change
blessing_of_change.description: Enemy units have -1 to hit when shooting at this unit.

disk_of_change.name: Disk of Change
disk_of_change.description: Gives the unit strider and impact(1). Also increases the units movement to 8 inches.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: This weapon ignores cover and may choose the model that is hit.

psychic_helmet.name: Psychic Helmet
psychic_helmet.description: The bearer gets +1 to all Psychic tests.

war_chant.name: War Chant
war_chant.description: This model and models in his unit gain the Furious keyword.

havoc_tactics.name: Traitor Tactics
havoc_tactics.description: This model and models in his unit gain +3 inch max range when shooting and +3 inches to charges.

wings.name: Daemon Wings
wings.description: Increases movement to 8 inches. Gives the model fly and ambush.

mutations.name: Mutations
mutations.description: When this unit fights in melee, roll one dice. On a roll of 1-3 the unit gains +1 AP to their attacks. On a roll of 4-6 the unit gains +1 attack per model. On a roll of 7-9 the unit is -1 to hit for the remainder fo the round. On a roll of 10, reroll until an ability is chosen.

daemonforge.name: Daemonforge
daemonforge.flavor: Imbued with demonic energy, traitor vehicles can call upon the powers of the dark gods.
daemonforge.description: Use before a Vehicle unit shoots. All hits have +1 AP.

blood_ritual.name: Blood Ritual
blood_ritual.flavor: With a simple sacrifice of flesh, comes a gift of life.
blood_ritual.description: Use when an Infantry unit is activated. Roll a D10 on a roll of 3 or less the unit regains 3 wounds (put on any models in the unit). On any other result it regains 2 wounds instead. If the unit has lost any models, they may be used to restore those models.

psychic_channeling.name: Psychic Channeling
psychic_channeling.flavor: With focus and energy, even the most difficult psychic powers can be manifested.
psychic_channeling.description: Use before a unit rolls for casting a psychic power. The spell charge value is increased by 1.

hex_rounds.name: Hex Rounds
hex_rounds.flavor: Sometimes used, hex rounds are imbued with psychic fire and are highly deadly.
hex_rounds.description: Use before an Infantry unit shoots. The attack has +5" maximum range.

psychic_fury.name: Psychic Fury
psychic_fury.flavor: The psyker explodes with energy, infused with additonal power.
psychic_fury.description: Use when activating a unit with the Psychic keyword. That unit may cast one additional psychic power.

relics.flavor: A helmet imbued with psychic energy.

breath_of_change.name: Breath of Change
breath_of_change.description: Target friendly unit within 10" may increase their charge by 3".

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.description: Target enemy unit within 10" takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

cursed_mutations.name: Cursed Mutation
cursed_mutations.description: Target enemy unit within 15" gets -1 to hit the next time it shoots.

fire_storm.name: Fire Storm
fire_storm.description: Target enemy unit within 12" must take a dangerous terrain test.

blessed_mutation.name: Blessed Mutation
blessed_mutation.description: Target friendly units within 12" gets Regeneration on rolls of 5- next time it takes wounds.

bolt_of_change.name: Bolt of Change
bolt_of_change.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 1 hit with AP(4) and 6 damage.
